name: Chamane
description:
Use your drum (SPACE) to perform three shapeshift rituals and become a true Shaman.
Move with WASD or the arrows.

Make one with the Insect, the Fish and finally the Sparrow.
Each of the three rituals has three steps
Finding the stone
Finding the pace
Playing the rhythm
Let the drum be your guide

(Headphones recommended)

SFX by HIRUNDO
MUSIC by CHAMANE ROOTS CANADA (MORUSQUE+RAMBOJET+HIRUNDO+SPOTLINE)
